content: लास्यं [लस्-ण्यत्] {@--1@} Dancing; a dance; आस्ये धास्यति कस्य लास्यमधुना… वाचां विपाको मम <ls>Bv. 4. 42</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A dance accompanied with singing and instrumental music. {@--3@} A dance in which the emotions of love are represented by means of various gesticulations and attitudes. --स्यः A dancer, an actor. --स्या A dancing girl.
